name: navigate
description: Open a path on the local test server. Only http://localhost:8000 is allowed.

name: click
description: Click a visible element. Selector must be a CSS selector or role-based '#id' or '[data-name=...]'.

selector.description: CSS selector, ID selector (#id), or data attribute selector [data-name='value']

name: type
description: Type text into an input field or contenteditable element.

selector.description: CSS selector for the input element

text.description: Text to type into the element

submit.description: Whether to press Enter after typing

name: read_text
description: Read the text content of an element.

selector.description: CSS selector for the element to read

name: wait_for
description: Wait for an element to be in a specific state.

selector.description: CSS selector for the element to wait for

name: read_memory
description: Read content stored in browser session/localStorage from previous actions.

name: done
description: Finish the episode and report summary of what was accomplished.

summary.description: Summary of actions taken and results achieved
